item.title: Ethereum Classic Now 3rd Most Traded Cryptocurrency After Bitcoin and Ethereum
item.description:
Ethereum Classic Now 3rd Most Traded Cryptocurrency After Bitcoin and Ethereum

According to coinmarketcap.com who does cryptocurrency market capitalizations, newly-split Ethereum Classic is now trading third, just behind Bitcoin and Ethereum on the list of the world's top cryptocurrencies.

item.title: München: Amokschütze soll sich Tatwaffe im Darknet besorgt haben - SPIEGEL ONLINE
item.description:
München: Amokschütze soll sich Tatwaffe im Darknet besorgt haben - SPIEGEL ONLINE

Der 18-jährige David S., der in München neun Menschen erschoss, hat sich seine Waffe offenbar über das Internet verschafft. Einem Medienbericht zufolge stammt sie aus der Slowakei. Der Amokschütze von München hat seine Tat nach Informationen der "Süddeutschen Zeitung" offenbar mit einer reaktivierten Theaterwaffe ausgeführt. Die Waffe trage ein Prüfzeichen aus der Slowakei.

item.title: Ether.Camp Holds Ethereum Hackathon with $50,000 Grand Prize
item.description:
Ether.Camp Holds Ethereum Hackathon with $50,000 Grand Prize

Ethereum blockchain explorer has kicked off its second-annual hackathon, featuring a grand prize of $50,000 and "significant rewards" for runners-up. Disclaimer: This article was provided by Bitcoin PR Buzz. Bitcoinist is not affiliated with the firms represented by Bitcoin PR Buzz and is not responsible for their products and/or services.

item.title: Dash Experiences a Surge in Price
item.description:
Dash Experiences a Surge in Price

Digital Cash, also known as DASH, is one of the various cryptocurrencies in existence. It's the third most valuable one, with a marketcap of $ 61,343,050 (the 7th biggest in crypto) and it boasts features like Darksend and InstantX, which were pioneered by Dash.

item.title: BitCluster Bitcoin De-Anonymizer Presented at HOPE Conference - NEWSBTC
item.description:
BitCluster Bitcoin De-Anonymizer Presented at HOPE Conference - NEWSBTC

BitCluster, a tool for analyzing and mapping Bitcoin transactions data will make it easier for people to track incoming and outgoing transactions on Bitcoin wallets. Read more... Bitcoin transactions are not anonymous, but pseudonymous at best. The digital currency transactions on the blockchain can be tracked to wallet addresses to uncover the whole transaction history, thanks to the transparent nature of the Bitcoin blockchain.

item.title: Ethereum Hard Fork Creates Competing Currencies as Support for Ethereum Classic Rises - CoinDesk
item.description:
Ethereum Hard Fork Creates Competing Currencies as Support for Ethereum Classic Rises - CoinDesk

The Ethereum hard fork executed last week as a means of reimbursing investors who lost funds in the collapse of a major project has resulted in the creation of a competing currency on a blockchain replicating the platform's original consensus rules prior to the fork.

item.title: Moody's: Blockchain Technology is 'Creating Competitive Pressure'

item.description:
